text: Alexander "Alex" McGregor (born 9 May 1896) was a Scottish footballer who played for Celtic, Dumbarton, St Mirren and Clydebank. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Celtic F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Year of death missing Category:St Mirren F.C. players Category:Clydebank F.C. (1914) players Category:People from Renfrew Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Alex McGregor (footballer, born 1896)
